message: On stable Chrome on stable OS X
open convore, sleep, wait a while, resume
and the tab now displays this Chrome error message:

This webpage is not available
The webpage at https://convore.com/ might be temporarily down or it may have moved permanently to a new web address.
Error 331 (net::ERR_NETWORK_IO_SUSPENDED): Unknown error.
I couldn't say exactly how long "a while" is: 5 seconds is not enough, but overnight definitely is
@ me if I can help further
Jupp, can reproduce it also on Windows (Chrome) when the machine enters stand-by
ERR_NETWORK_IO_SUSPENDED? I think it has nothing to do with Convore. It's Chrome's bug/feature.
Absolutely. But is this perhaps catchable?
